overview: Thien Nguyen is the Vice President of Software Development of Quosap. Working closely with the Chief Technology Officer, Thien is the technical lead & responsible for the development of the Quosap software platform. He also manages the engineering team of the company. Thien has been a software developer on many large-scale projects, including the new enterprise application suite of Oracle Corp. & the world-wide server system of Amazon.com Inc. He was one of the main developers of Clotho, the award-winning software platform for biotechnology research. Thien earned his BS in Computer Science with distinction from UC Berkeley.
